amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Title III--High-Cost Mortgages from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 110-450 to strike Title III--High-Cost Mortgages from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 245 (Roll no. 1116).
